question_prompt: Can get self ready in the morning and be on time for school by preferred method of transportation (bus, walking, driving)
Brings all necessary materials to school (homework, lunch, permission slips)
Brings all necessary supplies home to complete homework assignments or projects
Completes homework and returns it on time
Uses an organization system (day/weekly planner, notebook, electronic device) to keep track of assignments, tests, and projects
Relays messages from classroom teacher(s) to caregiver
Relays messages from caregiver to classroom teacher(s)
Finds out what they missed at school when they were absent and completes work
